metadata.title: CVE-2021-36625 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An SQL Injection vulnerability exists in Dolibarr ERP/CRM 13.0.2 (fixedversion is 14.0.0) via a POST request to the country_id parameter in anUPDATE statement.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
